name: Sale for End Year
introduction: Get ready for our end-of-year sale! Enjoy exclusive discounts on all memberships and classes.

name: Black Friday Sale
introduction: Black Friday is here! Take advantage of our biggest sale of the year with massive discounts on all products.

name: Summer Clearance
introduction: Clearance sale for summer! Get up to 50% off on selected items. Limited time offer.

name: Spring Sale
introduction: Spring into savings with our Spring Sale! Enjoy 25% off on all fitness gear and apparel.
